short_summary: Remediate contaminated soil from three areas at the CFSA property in Esquimalt, British Columbia
description: Contractors will perform remediation work on contaminated soil at the CFSA property.
tags: Travaux de traitement des sols pollués et rhabilitation
full_summary:
### EZ113-241031: Former CFSA Uplands Soil Remediation Tender

#### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for contaminated soil remediation at the former CFSA property in Esquimalt, British Columbia. The project aims to remove pollutants from the soil and restore the site to a safe and environmentally acceptable condition.

#### Project Details

* **Work Scope**: The contract will include, but not be limited to, the following tasks:
	+ Locating and marking utility lines within and surrounding the work areas
	+ Removing pollutants from contaminated soil in three designated areas (A, B, and C)
	+ Importing and analyzing materials, including recent environmental and geotechnical analysis, for all aggregates and soil products
* **Regions of Delivery**: The project will take place in British Columbia, Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4277522731
* **Amendment Number**: None
* **Publication Date**: October 26, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 22, 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **Name**: Simon Leung (Department of Public Works and Government Services)
* **Email**: [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17836722?extsite=MTc4MzY3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17836722?extsite=MTc4MzY3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
